pages.title: The Monstrosity
pages.text: $(italic)Something is lurking down there. You knew it!$()$(br2)A cruel monstrosity watching your every move, just waiting for the right moment to strike...(br)Be careful not to be torn to shreds and devoured. What a nice time to be alive.

pages.title: Loss?
pages.text: This being is powerful. Very powerful. Whatever it may be, it's not a good idea to face this thing unprepared.
